name: Click Critters - Darkness Edition
description: For those who'd like to navigate in a darker style in Click Critters :)
additional_info:
Current Version: 1.3.1 This is an experimental version made to replace the 5th birthday CC layout, haven't tested it with other layouts applied. I might update it in the future with further improvements. Update Notes Version 1.3.1 - A tiny fix for the Userinfo box that was lacking a tiny bit of its background. Version 1.3 - Fixed the BC area. Now that I finally added an avatar I realized what all the extra space was for. ;-; I wish someone would have told me that earlier! Version 1.2 - Fixed(?) the add that was squirming its way outside of the content div, commented where to change content background color and how to remove the header (helix9 tip!) Version 1.1 - sidorak95 fixed the header bug for us, yay. :) Version 1.05 - Moved the chatbox a little higher for practicity, let me know if it looks weird on people with more bottlecaps, or if you're an admin/mod/artist and you happen to have something useful filling that space. There's some things I was unable to change because they were hard-coded into the html, so I can't change it with CSS unfortunately.) Credits sidorak95 for fixing the header and making that part of the code cleaner, thank you so much <3 All images are copyright of clickcritters.com and their respective artitsts. I simply arranged the adopts for the heading and did new background images for everything, along with the CSS alterations to the original layout.
Other notes It's my first time doing this, so be gentle with me please. XD Feel free to send me feedback if you see something looking weird or broken, and I'll do my best to fix it!
